title: v1.2 - Quality of Life Update
content:
Updates

  • Value Changes: Updated value changes and added embedded visual status for Project Status.
  • Item Details: Updated page to show terminated copies next to owner count.
  • Bug Fix: Fixed critical issue where stock items could be oversold.
  • Changelogs: Added this changelog system!
  • Pagination: Added pagination to value changes page for better performance.
